title: Nintendo goes after Discord to find out who leaked the Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom art book
description: This is your semi-regular reminder that you are not actually anonymous on Discord.

title: PC Game Pass comes to 40 more countries
description: You can now get Microsoft's subscription based game service in Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, and a whole bunch more new places.

title: If you thought things couldn't get stupider, someone just held a CO2 reader up to a PC to prove 'bitcoin mining has zero carbon emissions'
description: No, it's not April 1, it's just stupid.

title: Dead Island 2 system requirements revealed
description: The long-awaited zombie survival game will have a three-player co-op mode, but will not support crossplay.

title: EVE Online player uses obscure rule to pull off the biggest heist in the game's history
description: The robbery was quick, quiet, and clean, and netted more than 2.2 trillion ISK—that's $22,300 in real money.

title: The Stanley Parable's narrator is somehow gaming's latest hunk
description: Gamers love a British disembodied voice, huh?

title: Discord's upping its puny file upload size limit for all users
description: Say goodbye to the 8 MB file size limit.

title: It's just getting silly now: Microsoft inks 10-year deal to bring Activision games to a UK mobile phone network
description: I'm not convinced Microsoft itself knows what that means.

title: Cyberpunk 2077's fancy RT Overdrive graphics now live but only if you have a megabucks Nvidia GPU
description: AMD and older Nvidia GPU owners are bang out of luck.

title: Resident Evil 4 actor strikes back at critics: 'not the first time an actor of colour faces racist and sexist harassment, for simply participating'
description: Harassers flooded Lily Gao's Instagram after her performance as Ada Wong, eventually leading her to wipe the account.

title: Portal writer Erik Wolpaw still wants to make Portal 3, but Valve's 'flat structure' makes it a challenge
description: More people at Valve need to get behind it.

title: Crounus cheaters are getting sniped across the biggest FPS games
description: Players using Cronus, Xim and similar devices are selling them off cheap after a slew of third-party hardware detection updates.

title: PC sales are down but can everyone please chill out
description: Shipments down by 30% in the first quarter of this year, but overall it really doesn't look that bad.

title: Run away from your problems and win an Xbox in Redfall's free choose-your-own browser game
description: Can I speak to the manager?

title: Nvidia's RTX 4070 matches RTX 3080 in leaked benchmarks
description: 30% faster than an RTX 3070 for an extra $100.

title: Unbrick your Wii U with a $4 Raspberry Pi Pico
description: For the 10 of us who bought one, this will be so handy.

title: Wordle hint and answer #661: Tuesday, April 11
description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.

title: Five new Steam games you probably missed (April 10, 2023)
description: Sorting through every new game on Steam so you don't have to.
